title: Champ select issues
body:
I've been getting this bug in champ select since 4.19 where the timer is somehow 5-10 seconds behind.
It will say I have 10 or so seconds left to pick a champ, and all of a sudden I will be kicked for not selecting one. 
This has happened 4 times and it's pretty annoying due to the loss of LP and the timeout.

I've had another problem where I'll go to select a champ, and right when I do I'll get kicked out and get the message that I failed to select one.
I've lost two promo series because of this, and I'm almost afraid to keep queuing up because it's completely random and I could just keep getting losses for no reason.

Anyone else had these problems?

replies.body:
Hello Mylo Snow!

Both of your issues that you described in detail may be due to a connection issue between the PVP.net Servers and your computer.  There are various steps you can take to try to fix this, but I want you to try a specific step to fix your Countdown clock in Champion Select.  This may actually be due to an out-of-date Windows Clock, as our client does use the Windows Clock as a dependency.  Make sure to try syncing it by completing these steps:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660-Issues-with-the-League-of-Legends-Store-PvP-Net-#jwq1

If this does not fix your clock and you are experiencing other issues in Champion Select as well such as "failing to select a champion" errors, then it may indicate a larger connection issue.  To this end, try completing the steps in this Knowledge Base Article:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

Their are quite a few steps, and some may be a bit lengthy, but they are common solutions to to these types of issues in Champion Select!  

If you have tried everything and are ready about to throw in the towel, don't give up just yet!  Make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our Tech Team!  They can help investigate this further and provide some new steps for you to take!  If you do send one over, make sure to include the following information:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3
Stop insulting people by telling them the problem is their fault. The problem is Riot's fault. Stop lieing to your users.
